summary: 'Hitting the Apex' is the story of six fighters - six of the fastest motorcycle racers the world has ever seen - and of the fates that awaited them at the peak of the sport.
cast: Jorge Lorenzo|Jose Manuel Lorenzo|Marc Marquez|Dani Pedrosa|Brad Pitt|Graziano Rossi|Valentino Rossi|Marco Simoncelli|Paolo Simoncelli|Casey Stoner
title: Hitting the Apex
